item.title: Introducing an icon module that scales
item.description: There was a time when crafting an icon font was iconic. Now the time has come to replace them with something better — something that can be easily processed, embedded and customized. Icons as they were meant to be so to say. With Hugo and without any additional tooling. Let’s use SVG icons! When I developed my first Hugo theme more than four years ago, I was searching for a reliable option to embed SVG icons as an alternative to icon fonts, but only for the icons that the users of the theme actually needed.

item.title: Welcome to Hackholics
item.description: This website is all about user-friendly guides for all Security Engineers | Pentesters | Researchers | Bug Hunters. Hackholics is the place where all the latest cyber security news and exploits are! Below you can find all currently available tricks which you can easily use to power up your skills or methodologies. More details coming soon… Made with by nikol4us.
